description: This file provides functions for revealing hints in a word-guessing game, including revealing a random unrevealed position and revealing the first letter of the target word. It manages hint limits per game session and interacts with the GameSession model for persisting state.

classes.name: GameSession
classes.description: Represents a game session, storing progress and state related to hints, completed status, and the target word.

methods.name: None _ensure_can_use_hint(session: GameSession)
methods.description: Checks whether the session can still use a hint, raising an error if the session is completed or hints limit reached.

methods.name: None _increment_hints(session: GameSession)
methods.description: Increments the hints used in the session, ensuring it does not exceed the maximum allowed.

methods.name: int _pick_unrevealed_position(session: GameSession)
methods.description: Selects a random index in the target word that hasn't been revealed yet.

methods.name: Tuple[int,str] _first_letter_position_and_value(session: GameSession)
methods.description: Returns the position (0) and letter of the first character of the target word.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] reveal_position(session: GameSession)
methods.description: Public function to reveal a random unrevealed position in the target word, with hint limits enforced.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] reveal_first_letter(session: GameSession)
methods.description: Public function to reveal the first letter of the target word, with hint limits enforced.
